name: Glass Fist
description:
A little game made for Ludum Dare 36.

I didnt finish all the game, but this is everything I could do, I didnt have too much time this weekend, you have a fist of glass, and you use it to beat some enemies, and you have to recreate it everytime it breaks, then you use your sand for it, but you can't be out of sand, the glass is made of flexible glass so you can make this flexible or use it as a normal glass.

Songs used from Freesound:

License : https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

https://www.freesound.org/people/FoolBoyMedia/soun...

https://www.freesound.org/people/levelclearer/soun...

Controls:

Arrows to move

Z to Jump and DoubleJump

X to recrate the fist of glass

X to attack

C to change it to the shield of glass
